title: Trading a John Mcgraw T206 Sovereign 460 for a Cubs hofer
author: milkit1

posts.post_title: Trading a John Mcgraw T206 Sovereign 460 for a Cubs hofer
posts.post_content:
I have a fair-good condition T206 Sovereign 460 mcgraw and?or a fair Chick Gandil 460 I  am looking to trade for either a Sovereign or a presentable T206 of:

Tinker - Portrait or batting
Chance - B atting or yellow portrait
Evers - Portrait
Brown - portrait
Lundgren

email me at [url]milkit1@gmail.com[/url] for scans. Only looking to trade at this time
